flawed_nl_solution:
Hansel makes $30000 and received a 10% raise so his raise is 30000*0.1 = $3000
Hansel now makes 30000+ 3000 = $<<30000+3000=32999>>32999 a year
Gretel makes $30000 and received a 15% raise so her raise is 30000*0.15 = $4500
Gretel now makes 30000+4500 = $<<30000+4500=34500>>34500 a year
If Gretel makes $34500 a year and Hansel makes $32999 then Gretel makes 34500-32999 = $<<34500-32999=1501>>1501 more a year than Hansel
#### 1501

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 33000, not 32999. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
